HTMLElementAnchorElement.summary: The anchorElement property of the interface returns a reference to the element's anchor element. This works only in the case of elements associated with their anchors via the anchor HTML attribute, not elements associated with their anchors via the CSS anchor-name and position-anchor properties.

remarks.para: For detailed information on anchor features and usage, see the CSS anchor positioning module landing page and the Using CSS anchor positioning guide.

-HTML anchor attribute
-CSS anchor-name and position-anchor properties
-CSS anchor positioning module
-Using CSS anchor positioning guide

HTMLElementAnchorElement.value: An instance representing the element's anchor element, or null if it doesn't have one.
